channel.title: Release-Candidate on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Release-Candidate on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: GitHub Enterprise Server 3.20 release candidate is available
item.description:
GitHub Enterprise Server 3.20 release candidate is available. The changelog post indicates improvements in deployment efficiency, monitoring, code security, and policy management, but provides no concrete details in the provided excerpt.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: ai: Microsoft Agent Framework Reaches Release Candidate
item.description:
Microsoft Agent Framework has reached Release Candidate for both .NET and Python. Microsoft states the v1.0 API surface is stable and intended v1.0 features are complete on the path to General Availability.

  • Source: Microsoft AI Foundry Blog

item.title: github: GitHub Enterprise Server 3.19 release candidate is now available
item.description:
GitHub Enterprise Server (GHES) 3.19 release candidate is now available, focusing on improved deployment efficiency, enhanced monitoring, stronger code security, and better policy management with a more intuitive flow.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: dotnet: Announcing .NET 10 Release Candidate 2
item.description:
Microsoft announced .NET 10 Release Candidate 2, emphasizing final quality, reliability, and stabilization across the runtime, SDK, libraries, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, .NET MAUI, and related components.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: dotnet: Announcing .NET 10 Release Candidate 1
item.description:
.NET 10 Release Candidate 1 is now available, bringing improvements across the runtime, SDK, libraries, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, .NET MAUI, and more.

  • Source: .NET
